title: MMR?
body: Look at match history i did well in my ranked games but i cant seem to figure out how this MMR works...does it base it off ur team mates how u do in game or wut cause for the few game si did well till someone got fed and i couldn't do much and i don't think that is rly my fault cause i didn't loose lane so ya and ive been playing well so idk it rly bugs me how its because of someone in my team making dumb decisions that i have to face the consequences with them  and u can watch the replays of my game if u want all i want to do is get to silver 5 thats all i went from 5 winning streak 1 win more to promos to now a 2 loosing streak and about 3 games more till promos

replies.body:
Although we don't actually know officially how it is calculated, we kinda assume that MMR changes based on your performance (win/loss) against the average MMR of players you faced in ranked game.

Saying that,

*  If you go on a big win streak, your MMR will increase and you will gain lots and lose not much. 

* If you go on a big loss streak, your MMR will decrease and you will lose lots and gain not much. 

If you would like, you can **vaguely** check your MMR [here ](http://oce.op.gg).

On the point of losing streaks, don't worry about them, it makes it worse. Just have a break (maybe play a different game) and when you come back you will be nice and refreshed.  
(I have been through this so many times, [check this link](http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/2181252) and expand my lolking score and see the tilt at the end of last season)
